summary: A dragonbone helmet that lets you show your loyalty to the legion!
descriptionHtml:
A work-in-progress version of the Imperial helmets made out of dragonbone. It is temperable at the workbench and craftable at any forge under imperial (as long as you have the Dragon Smithing perk). There are currently 2 variants available on the forge; Regular (Black plume) and Legate (Red plume)

I felt that there aren\'t enough higher level armors that still let you fly your imperial colors, and the legion seems to be largely ignored by modders. I aim to fix that. 

Future Plans: 
Higher Resolution Textures (Don\'t hold your breath)
Both variants of Imperial Helmet
Different colored Plume (The scrub brush on your head)

Programs Used:
GIMP
FOMOD
NifSkope
Creation  Kit

Thanks to:
 Bethesda for the original mesh and the world\'s greatest RPG\'s
author: Jethroe
